Class PCAPLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ofcprobe.vswitch.trafficgen.PCAPLoader

  • public class PCAPLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    PreLoads a PCAP and delivers next PacketPayload from PCAP on request
    Author:
    Christopher Metter(christopher.metter@informatik.uni-wuerzburg.de)
